title: Person fatally shot while driving in N.J. city, authorities say
body: One person was fatally shot Monday afternoon while driving in New Brunswick, officials said.Police found the victim, identified only as male, wounded around 4:30 p.m. near Handy Street and Paul Robeson Boulevard, according to the . The shooting victim died at a local hospital.“The investigation is active and continuing,” the prosecutor’s office said in a statement.Video from local news website  showed three vehicles - two cars and an SUV - that and cordoned off at the intersection. New Brunswick police appeared to be taking pictures of another vehicle near the crash scene.A spokesman for the New Brunswick police did not immediately return a message for comment. More information was not released as of late Monday.    Note to readers: if you purchase something through one of our affiliate links we may earn a commission.
